thread.section_title: Pavillon Nation - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Pavillon Nation, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Brent S
title: Great location
text: We stayed for two nights. It is a smallish room but the hotel staff were very friendly (especially Tina) and spoke good english, breakfast was great with basics but coffee and tea, breads, cereal and yogurts. The best part was the location. Close to many restaurants and markets, and metro. We felt very safe there and would go back.
